recipesJson.name: Bears all rolled up
recipesJson.author: SlashaLO
recipesJson.description:
In honor of @ZestyVapes birthday, i decided to butcher a candy vape and destroy it more. 

Thinking about movie to 27 bears over jelly candy. Have to see how the chem off note

reviews.text: A Delicious fruity mix that compliments the Forrest Mix very well!! be sure to steep this one for Full Berry Flavors!! Thanks @SlashaLO!
